content.en: SOC Testing Optimization: Researchers are exploring ways to improve the testing process for System-On-Chip (SOC) designs. They are using algorithms to solve problems related to resource allocation, test scheduling, and test access mechanisms. These algorithms aim to optimize the testing time, reduce the number of required resources, and improve the efficiency of test architectures.
content.da: Optimering af SOC-testning: Forskere undersøger måder at forbedre testprocessen for System-On-Chip (SOC)-designs. De bruger algoritmer til at løse problemer relateret til ressourceallokering, testsplanlægning og testadgangsmekanismer. Disse algoritmer sigter mod at optimere testtiden, reducere antallet af påkrævede ressourcer og forbedre effektiviteten af testarkitekturer.
